data.text: Loleni unoghelo mkulu wa Aba watwing'ile twetwe, mbaka twokemighwa iwana we Imulungu! Na apfo pfipfo pfatuli. Iwanu we iisi ino ng'awotumanya bae, kwaapfila ng'awammanyile bae Imulungu.
Sale tsangu, sambi twetwe twa iwana we Imulungu, ila ng'ana imanyike bae itsakuwatse. Lekeni twomanya ka hayatsolawila twitseghala naye, kwaapfila tutsomwona apfila pfayali.
Imunu wowose iyomlolela Kiristu, ketenda mwenyegho yele ka Kiristu pfayelile.
Imunu wowose iyotenda nzambi ng'okinda bae ghamalaghitso ghe Imulungu, kwaapfila kutenda nzambi, ako kuko kuleka kukinda ghamalaghitso.
Lekeni mwemwe mwomanya ka Kiristu katsa ili yatuleghusile nzambi tsetu, naye kahela nzambi yoyose.
Apfo imunu wowose iyokala mghati mwa Kiristu ng'oghendelela bae kutenda nzambi, lekeni imunu wowose iyoghendelela kutenda nzambi ng'amwonile Kiristu bae, wala ng'ammanyile.
Wanangu, imunu wowose aleke kuwabughani. Imunu iyotenda pfinu ipfimnoghelesa Imulungu, ayo komnoghelesa Imulungu, ka Kiristu pfayomnoghelesa Imulungu.
Imunu wowose iyoghendelela kutenda nzambi ayo ka imunu wa Yehile, kwaapfila Yehile tsakatenda nzambi kulawa mwanduso. Kwaajili ayo Imwana we Imulungu tsakatsa muisi kutsihinya sang'ano tsa Yehile.
Chila iyawile imwana we Imulungu ng'oghendelela bae kutenda nzambi, mana mbuli ye Imulungu yokala mghati mwake, ng'odaha bae kughendelela kutenda nzambi kwaapfila yeye kawa imwana we Imulungu.
Imunu wowose yang'otenda ighomnoghelesa Imulungu na yang'omnoghela ndughu yake, ayo si imwana we Imulungu bae. Apfi pfipfo pfawomanyika iwana we Imulungu na iwana wa Yehile.
Ahuno usenga wamuhulike kulawa mwanduso. Twinoghele!

Mleke kwighala na Kaini, iyalongotsighwe na Yehile, kamkoma mdodo wake Abeli. Ebali yamkomile? Kwaapfila aghala ghang'ali yotenda tsagheha, na aghala gha mdodo wake tsaghang'ali ghomnoghelesa Imulungu.
Ndughu tsangu mleke kukangawala wanu we isi ino wang'awahilani.
Twomanya ka tuluta kulawa mne lifwa twingila mne ughima, kwaapfila twowanoghela ndughu tsetu. Imunu wowose iyalihela unoghelo ayo kamne lifwa.
Imunu wowose iyomhila ndughu yake, ayo mkoma wanu, namwe mwomanya mkoma wanu kahela ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose iukala mghati mwake.
Apfi pfipfo pfatuumanya unoghelo pfauli, Yesu Kiristu katulapfila twetwe ughima wake. Na twetwe tuwalapfile ughima wetu ndughu tsetu.
Ka imunu kana pfinu na baho komwona ndughu yake kobama pfinu, naye ng'omwonela libatsi bae, lelo yodahatse kulonga ka komnoghela Imulungu?
Wanangu, tuleke kuwanoghela iwanu kwa kulonga kuliheka, ila tuwanoghele kwa ghamatendo na ukweli.
Apfi pfipfo pfatudaha kumanya ka twetwe twa iwanu wa ukweli, na mimoyo yetu ng'aitsopfukapfuka bae hambele hake.
Kwaapfila hata ka mimoyo yetu yotuhigha twiha, twomanya Imulungu ka mkulu kubita mimoyo yetu, naye koghamanya ghose.
Sale tsangu, ka mimoyo yetu ng'aituhigha bae, twodaha kuleka kupfuka hambele he Imulungu.
Twobokela kulawa kuna yeye chochose chatumlomba, kwaapfila twoghakinda ghamalaghitso ghake na kutenda aghala ighomnoghela.
Na laghitso lyake ilyo lino, tulitoghole taghwa lya Yesu Kiristu, Imwanaghe, na twinoghele twetwe kwa twetwe ka pfayatulaghitse.

Iwanu wala iwoghakinda ghamalaghitso gha Imulungu wokala mghati mwe Imulungu, na Imulungu kokala mghati mwawo. Apfo kwa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka ghwatwing'ighwe ne Imulungu, twetwe twomanya ka Imulungu kokala mghati mwetu.
